attributes.action: Out of the Brexit debacle, No current MP should be allowed to be an MP again
attributes.additional_details: I believe that the actions, behaviour and self satisfying attitude of the House of Commons and the MPs there in, is evidence enough that these so called representatives of the people should never be MPs again.
attributes.background: All of the existing Members of Parliament, no matter what party they represent, should not be allowed to take part in the government  of the UK. This Parliament has made the UK a laughing stock not only in Europe but worldwide surpassing the Trump Government of the US.
